title: Website not loading properly
description: The homepage takes too long to load and sometimes shows a 500 error.

title: Unable to reset password
description: Customer tried password reset several times but didnâ€™t receive the reset email.

title: Payment not going through
description: The checkout page freezes when trying to make payment using credit card.

title: Database connection error
description: The admin panel fails to connect to the database after latest update.

title: Images not displaying on product page
description: Product images appear as broken links on the product details page.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Customer not receiving order confirmation or update emails.

title: Mobile layout issue
description: The website layout breaks on small screens and overlaps text.

title: Order history missing
description: Customer cannot see past orders after logging in.

title: Slow checkout process
description: Checkout takes more than 30 seconds to load the payment page.

title: Search function not returning results
description: The search bar does not display any results even when valid items exist.
